title: "Creating a reference map to explore the electronic device mimicking brain activity"
excerpt: "Just like explorers need maps, scientists require guides to better understand and advance new technology. A neuromorphic device, which can mimic the neural cells in our brain, has lacked such a guideline and created headaches for scientists trying to understand their operational mechanisms."
